articles.content: Find out what’s new on ST website and app. Some can also find that insurance agents pressure them into buying products that they are not certain they need. articles.content: SINGAPORE: “Do you feel lonely in Singapore too?” a local Reddit user asked in a post on Monday morning (Jul 21). articles.title: Singtel unit prices S$160 million in fixed-rate notes at 2.726%
articles.summary:
📰 비즈니스, 교통, 금융 관련 뉴스
📢 Singtel unit prices S$160 million in fixed-rate notes at 2.726%
articles.content: They will be issued on Jul 25 and mature 10 years from that date. They will be issued under Optus Finance’s Euro Medium Term Note programme, which has a size of three billion euros (S$4.5 billion). Net proceeds will be swapped for Australian dollars and used to fund Optus’ regular business operations. OCBC has been appointed as the sole lead manager and bookrunner for the issuance. All rights reserved.
